function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Combine iot data with medical professional input, establish clear protocols for human intervention, and provide training on interpreting iot data.","category":"Collaborating with experts from other fields to create comprehensive disease mitigation and prevention strategies.","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Implementing safety and precautionary measures","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implementing iot-based environmental monitoring and control systems","category":"Control of airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Utilizing iot for real-time communication and monitoring of safety compliance","category":"Use of smart/innovative air quality controls technology","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Tailoring policies to fit the specific characteristics of each location and increasing awareness and acceptance of policies among the public.","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Collaborating with experts from other fields to create comprehensive disease mitigation and prevention strategies.","category":"Social activities / facilitatie social interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Addressing psychological barriers, providing support and resources for mental well-being","category":"Improving physical health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Investing in technology for virtual events, contactless systems, and adaptable infrastructure for distancing measures.","category":"Support recovery of sectors via remote work","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implementing zoning regulations for lower density, promoting green spaces, and using technology for contact tracing","category":"Occupancy control (eg separating at/risk contaminated population)","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Encourage in-person shopping by creating attractive and accessible retail spaces, promote sustainable packaging for online shopping","category":"Occupancy control (eg separating at/risk contaminated population)","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Community engagement, financial support, mental health resources","category":"Facilitate transparent communication","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Community engagement, flexible urban design, promoting local open spaces","category":"Outdoor spaces","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement zoning laws and regulations to control the spread of urban development and encourage mixed-use spaces to reduce the need for long-distance travel.","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Developing secure and safe packaging for biological samples, implementing strict handling procedures","category":"Control airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Establish rigorous validation processes and continuous monitoring of ai algorithms","category":"Control of airflows airtight / negative pressure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Implement strong encryption and security measures, and strict data access controls","category":"Control of airflows airtight / negative pressure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Implement strict data protection and privacy laws, anonymize data, and obtain consent from individuals.","category":"Facilitate transparent communication","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Regulate the use of surveillance data, conduct regular audits, and impose strict penalties for unauthorized use.","category":"Facilitate transparent communication","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Public education on the limitations of surveillance technology, promotion of other preventive measures, and monitoring public behavior.","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement strict hygiene protocols for in-person components of education, prioritize online teaching where possible","category":"Personal hygiene (eg handwashing)","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Educate participants on hygiene best practices, enforce guidelines for virtual interactions","category":"Early detection","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limit physical gatherings, promote virtual participation, enforce safety protocols for in-person events","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement work from home and distance learning strategies to reduce close contact.","category":"Shift controls (occupancy control of total users)","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Regular maintenance and sanitization schedules for the robots, along with proper training for healthcare workers in robot interaction.","category":"Cleaning technologies robots","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implementation of robust cybersecurity measures, privacy policies, and data encryption techniques.","category":"Control of airflows airtight / negative pressure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implementing controlled market opening with limited people and social distancing measures, providing supplies to severely affected areas, and creating a system for online ordering and delivery.","category":"Absorb surge in service demande","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement strict quality control measures and sanitation protocols for new manufacturing processes.","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Training and support for health care workers, adoption of ai technology for data management.","category":"Staff training / upskilling","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Establishing strategic stockpiles of essential medical supplies, diversifying suppliers, and implementing advanced inventory management systems","category":"Minimize supply chain disruptions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Regular disinfection of surfaces, implementation of air filtration systems, and promotion of hand hygiene practices","category":"Disinfection of air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Diversifying the sources of ventilator supply, developing standardized protocols for alternative ventilator use, and investing in local ventilator manufacturing capabilities","category":"Absorb surge in service demande","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement a scheduling system for purchasing basic necessities to limit the number of people in stores at the same time.","category":"Occupancy control (eg separating at/risk contaminated population)","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use ai and ml to aggregate and analyze scientific literature to make it more accessible to researchers.","category":"Promote verified information","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement ai and ml solutions for supply chain optimization and tele-health management.","category":"Absorb resource shortages","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement strong data encryption and user-controlled data sharing","category":"Control of airflows airtight / negative pressure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Regular screening for antibiotic-resistant strains, validation and verification of ai predictions.","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Independent validation of ai predictions, rigorous testing and evaluation of ai-assisted drug development.","category":"Prevent fake news","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Regular calibration and validation of ml algorithms, manual verification of ventilator settings by healthcare professionals.","category":"Monitor and control indoor air quality","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Regular validation and verification of ai diagnosis by medical professionals, along with human oversight in critical decision-making.","category":"Early detection","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Combining ai screening with traditional diagnostic methods, regular updates of ai algorithms based on new data, and of algorithm with real patient outcomes, expert analysis, and clinical data","category":"Monitor and control indoor air quality","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Encourage and incentivize hospitals to
